metadata.title: CVE-2017-15612 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
mistune.py in Mistune 0.7.4 allows XSS via an unexpected newline (such asin java\nscript:) or a crafted email address, related to the escape andautolink functions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15612` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-mistune - 0.8.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mistune package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.3-2').
